text: Schiff calls on Biden to drop out, citing ‘serious concerns’ he can't win  —  Rep. Adam B. Schiff (D-Burbank), who is running for U.S. Senate in California, is calling for President Biden to drop out of the presidential race, he said in an exclusive statement Wednesday to The Times.
